name: io.github.nihitgupta2/devstudio
description: Production-grade MCP server for professional screen recording and demo automation. Features 6 recording tools with multi-monitor support, H.264+AAC muxing, and AI-driven workflow integration.

tools.name: start_recording
tools.description: Start a new recording session with screen, audio, and/or terminal capture

tools.name: stop_recording
tools.description: Stop an active recording session and retrieve output file paths

tools.name: capture_screen
tools.description: Take a single screenshot of any monitor

tools.name: list_active_sessions
tools.description: List all active recording sessions and their status

tools.name: mux_audio_video
tools.description: Combine separate audio and video files into a single MP4

tools.name: get_available_screens
tools.description: Get information about all available monitors and their properties
